documentation.text:
@title BotPayment
 @dev Smart contract to manage automatic payments from AI bots to the moderator

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BotPayment: caller is not the moderator"

arguments.value: BotPayment: caller is not the moderator

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BotPayment: caller is not the moderator"

documentation.text:
@dev Constructor sets the moderator address
 @param _moderator Address of the moderator who will receive payments

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BotPayment: payment amount must be greater than zero"

arguments.value: BotPayment: payment amount must be greater than zero

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BotPayment: payment amount must be greater than zero"

documentation.text:
@dev Function to pay the moderator directly
 @return success True if payment is successful

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BotPayment: contract has no balance to transfer"

arguments.value: BotPayment: contract has no balance to transfer

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BotPayment: contract has no balance to transfer"

documentation.text:
@dev Transfer the entire contract balance to the moderator
 @return success True if transfer is successful

@dev Get contract balance
 @return amount Current contract balance
@dev Receive function to accept direct payments
